item.title: Fisrt
item.description: hello //哈夫曼树 #include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; struct node { char val; //字符 int frequency; //频率 int priority; //优先级 node* left; node* right; node(char c,int fre,int pri,node l=NULL,node r=NULL):val(c),frequency(fre),priority(pri),left(l),right(r) {} node(){} }; struct Cmp { //先按字符出现的频率排序，如果相同就按优
